must_reads.title: MICE: Minimal Interaction Cross-Encoders for efficient Re-ranking
must_reads.summary: arXiv:2602.16299v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Cross-encoders deliver state-of-the-art ranking effectiveness in information retrieval, but have a high inference cost. This prevents them from being used as first-stage rankers, but also incurs a cost when re-ranking documents. Prior work has addressed this bottleneck from two largely separate directions: accelerating cross-encoder inference by sparsifying the attention process or improving first-stage retrieval effectiveness using more complex mo
